casebody.data:
UNITED STATES ex rel. David GUTERMAN, Relator-Appellant, v. Jesse D. MOORE, U. S. Marshal, etc., et al., Respondents-Appellees. No. 248. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 6, 1931. David P. Siegel, of New York City (Leo H. Klugherz, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Howard W. Ameli, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., and Herbert H. Kellogg, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., for appellees.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
